titles.title: Medical Device Cybersecurity Act of 2017
Medical Device Cybersecurity Act of 2017
A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to provide cybersecurity protections for medical devices.
Medical Device Cybersecurity Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
